041package org.jfree.chart.renderer;
042
043import java.io.ObjectStreamException;
044import java.io.Serializable;
045
046/**
047 * An enumeration of the 'end types' for an area renderer.
048 */
049public final class AreaRendererEndType implements Serializable {
050
051    /** For serialization. */
052    private static final long serialVersionUID = -1774146392916359839L;
053
054    /**
055     * The area tapers from the first or last value down to zero.
056     */
057    public static final AreaRendererEndType TAPER = new AreaRendererEndType(
058            "AreaRendererEndType.TAPER");
059
060    /**
061     * The area is truncated at the first or last value.
062     */
063    public static final AreaRendererEndType TRUNCATE = new AreaRendererEndType(
064            "AreaRendererEndType.TRUNCATE");
065
066    /**
067     * The area is levelled at the first or last value.
068     */
069    public static final AreaRendererEndType LEVEL = new AreaRendererEndType(
070            "AreaRendererEndType.LEVEL");
071
072    /** The name. */
073    private String name;
074
075    /**
076     * Private constructor.
077     *
078     * @param name  the name.
079     */
080    private AreaRendererEndType(String name) {
081        this.name = name;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Returns a string representing the object.
086     *
087     * @return The string.
088     */
089    @Override
090    public String toString() {
091        return this.name;
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Returns <code>true</code> if this object is equal to the specified
096     * object, and <code>false</code> otherwise.
097     *
098     * @param obj  the object (<code>null</code> permitted).
099     *
100     * @return A boolean.
101     */
102    @Override
103    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
104        if (this == obj) {
105            return true;
106        }
107        if (!(obj instanceof AreaRendererEndType)) {
108            return false;
109        }
110        AreaRendererEndType that = (AreaRendererEndType) obj;
111        if (!this.name.equals(that.toString())) {
112            return false;
113        }
114        return true;
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Ensures that serialization returns the unique instances.
119     *
120     * @return The object.
121     *
122     * @throws ObjectStreamException if there is a problem.
123     */
124    private Object readResolve() throws ObjectStreamException {
125        Object result = null;
126        if (this.equals(AreaRendererEndType.LEVEL)) {
127            result = AreaRendererEndType.LEVEL;
128        }
129        else if (this.equals(AreaRendererEndType.TAPER)) {
130            result = AreaRendererEndType.TAPER;
131        }
132        else if (this.equals(AreaRendererEndType.TRUNCATE)) {
133            result = AreaRendererEndType.TRUNCATE;
134        }
135        return result;
136    }
137
138}
